title: Dems Link Debt To Spending Bill, UNGA
itunes:title: Dems Link Debt To Spending Bill, UNGA
description:
Guests: Erik Wasson, Bloomberg News Congress reporter, Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget President, Maya MacGuineas, Brett Bruen, Global Situation Room President, and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
